ud1.2:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava uruvelayam viharati najja neranjaraya tire bodhirukkhamule pathamabhisambuddho.
ud1.2:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava sattaham ekapallankena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapatisamvedi.
ud1.2:1.4: Atha kho bhagava tassa sattahassa accayena tamha samadhimha vutthahitva rattiya majjhimam yamam paticcasamuppadam patilomam sadhukam manasakasi:
ud1.2:2.1: “Iti imasmim asati idam na hoti, imassa nirodha idam nirujjhati, yadidam—
ud1.2:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
